text: @cnni Are people aware fecal matter has been doing this before coronavirus?! Like what have you been doing before? It ain’t hard to close the damn lid before flushing. Been known about poo toothbrushes in the 3m radius since watching the ‘Bones’ episode many moons ago

entity.name: Bones
entity.description: Temperance Brennan est une anthropologue hautement qualifiée qui travaille à l'Institut Jeffersonian. En examinant les squelettes de personnes décédées, elle est capable d'en reconstituer la vie et les circonstances de la mort.
